data.title: Teachers' Pensions
data.text:
General enquiries

The best way for members to contact us is through our secure member area My Pension Online.

Before you call

When contacting us we are required to complete some simple verification checks.

Please ensure you have the following details to hand:

Full name

Date of birth

National Insurance number

Teachers' Pensions reference number

You'll also be asked for additional security questions.

If your query is in relation to service history please get in touch with your employer from the time of service.

Due to security reasons we're unable to accept changes to your details via phone, email, secure message or the web chat/WhatsApp service. Please use My Pension Online to update your personal details, or you can write to us.

Contact options

Our most popular contact options are:

Secure messages: My Pension Online

Call: 0345 6066166 (BT local rate number)

International call: +44 1227 213243

Secure chat: Chat icon on the right hand side of our website

WhatsApp messaging: Click to message on 07545 932848 (This link opens in a new window) (please note it may take up to two working days to receive a response and this number doesnâ€™t allow phone calls)

If you make use of a special type of telephone with a small keyboard attached, often known as a minicom device or textphone, we've an option for you:

Minicom: 0345 6099899

Finally if you'd prefer to write us our address is:

Teachers' Pensions

11b Lingfield Point

Darlington

DL1 1AX

Welsh Language
